alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 2:33PM MST until December 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /10 PM PST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow above 5000 feet.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley
